definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: end (Lag:BN 10 Ges:§ 95n);—cstr. ´[[ק]]: Ne 7:69 (Gi Baer, v:70 van d. H.) + ; sf. [[קְחָתָם]] Da 1:5; pl. abs. [[קְחָוֹת]] Ex 38:5, Ps 65:9 ( + perh. [[קחוותו]] Ex 37:8, Ex 39:4 Kt. v. [[קָחָה]]; Kö:ii. 1:61 der. these pl. forms fr. [[[קָָחוּ]]]);—
end, of corners of grating Ex 38:5 (‖[[קְחוֹתָיו ]] Ex 27:4), cf. Ex 37:8, Ex 39:4 supr. (all P); ends of earth Ps 65:9.
[[מִקְחָת]] (some) from the end of, some of ([[מִן]]
´[[מִק]]: at the end of  a certain time Da 1:5, Da 1:15, Da 1:18.
